@references.transparency: Values range from 0-100%, 100% means it is fully visible.

desc: The mod may change the appearance of an item (or other visual components), by for example manipulating it's tooltip.
If such a modification is present there will be a <color #355AA0>🌊</color> prefix, this is done to help identify the origin of any changes and therefore can't be disabled.
Enables a few different debugs, throughout the mod
<red>May lead to crashes or unexpected/undefined behaviour

blaze.desc: Highlights the blaze slayer in the color of the current attunement

own_boss.desc: Adds glow highlights to your slayer boss

minis.desc: Highlights all minibosses with a <red>red</red> glow effect.

big_boys.desc: Highlight higher tier mini bosses in <dark_red>dark red</dark_red>.

modifyCommissions.desc: Modifies commission items to be visually different when you started or finished it.

desc: Turns most carpets in the dwarven mines <red>red</red> to make them more visible.
Allows resource packs to change the appearance of glacite tunnel blocks.
Allows resource packs to change the appearance of blocks in the mist.
Allows resource packs to change the appearance of gemstones.
Send a chat or party message when you enter a Mineshaft.
Will send in chat if not in a party.

announce-type.desc: The type of message to send when you enter a Mineshaft.

waypoint.desc: Show a waypoint on all possible Corpse Locations in a Mineshaft.

key-announce.desc: Send a chat message how many keys of the current mineshaft corpses you have in your sacks.

shiftCost.desc: Shows the amount of powder that will be consumed on shift click.

totalProgress.desc: Shows your total progress to maxing a perk.

stackSize.desc: Shows the perk level as item stack count.

totalLeft.desc: Displays the total amount that is still required to max a perk.

area_walls.desc: Adds walls between the areas in the crystal hollows.

puzzler.desc: Highlights the correct block for the puzzler.

sack_value.desc: Shows the value of all items in your sacks.

price_source.desc: The source to use for the price of items in sacks.

profile_in_chat.desc: Show the profile icon in chat messages.

piggy_repair_helper.desc: Sends a chat message to get 8 Enchanted Pork from sacks when the piggy bank breaks.

sack_notification.desc: Show a notification when you gain specific sack items.

sack_notification_items.desc: The items to show notifications for.

pest_bait_type.desc: Adds a UI element that shows which pest bait increases the chance of spawning a specific pest.

desk_pest_highlight.desc: Highlights on what Plot how many pests are on in the 'Configure Plots' menu.

ministerInCalendar.desc: Adds a current minister next to the mayor in the calendar.

anvilHelper.desc: Highlights books that have the same enchantment as the ones in the anvil.

previousServer.desc: Sends a chat message when you join a server you were previously in.

previousServerTime.desc: The time a server is cached and shows up as previously joined.

hideLightning.desc: Hides lightning bolts and sky flash effect.

showHiddenPetCandy.desc: Hypixel hides the pet candy line once its max level, this feature re-adds the line.

desc: Settings to change the appearance of armours on either yourself or others.
<italic>Does not apply to npcs.</italic>

trophy_numbers.desc: Displays the amount of trophy fishes you caught upon catching one.

hook_text_scale.desc: Changes the scale of the text above your fishing hook/bobber.

lava_replacement.desc: Replaces the lava texture with the water texture while in the Crimson Isle.

hotspot.desc: All settings for the hotspot highlight.

circle_surface.desc: Render a "solid" circle instead of the particle outline.

desc: Changes the transparency of the surface.

circle_outline.desc: Render a "solid" outline instead of the particle outline.

desc: Changes the transparency of the outline.
All items that have any modification present in the lore are prefixed with <color #355AA0>🌊</color>
To list all modifications that are present press <gray>shift</gray>.
Compacts the installed upgrade parts into one line each.
§cOff:
<gray>Fuel Tank: <red>Not Installed
<gray>Increases fuel capacity with part installed.
§aOn:
<gray>Fuel Tank: <red>Not Installed

dungeon_quality.desc: Adds the dungeon quality to the lore.

highlight_perfect.desc: Highlights the dungeon quality line for items with a 50/50 score.
